Room.Name: Guardian's Treasure Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a smaller section of the Guardian's temple. The ceiling is quite low, but you manage to get through. A glittering object greets you towards the center of the room.
Room.LongDescription: Upon further examination, you notice that the glittering object is in fact some sort of sword. However, it's embedded in a large stone idol standing some eight feet tall. You find it impossible to get the sword out of the idol. Looking more carefully at the idol, you notice a necklace engraved in the stone, but it's missing a gem. It looks like it's been pried out by looters.
